name: Chaos God
description:
Become the chaos god you've always wished to be, as you demolish endless hordes of villagers! 

Goal: Survive as long as you can! 

How to play: Mouse click to drop projectile, move mouse to move! Collect the villagers' "chaos points" as they go up into the sky! But beware, as they are also trying to defeat you with an endless barrage of arrows!
